function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of flexibility in supply chain network design","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to high-impact disruptions","Mitigation":"Incorporate flexibility throughout all supply chain operations and levels","Technologies":"Supply chain modeling and optimization software","People":"Supply chain managers, logistics professionals","Owner":"Supply chain management team"},{"Description":"Reliance on Just-in-Time manufacturing philosophy","Impact":"Amplifies the effects of disruptions in supply chains","Mitigation":"Diversify manufacturing and inventory strategies","Technologies":"Inventory management systems, predictive analytics","People":"Manufacturing and operations managers","Owner":"Manufacturing and operations teams"},{"Description":"Non-collaborative structures in supply chain","Impact":"Reduces ability to respond effectively to disruptions","Mitigation":"Promote collaboration among supply chain actors","Technologies":"Collaboration platforms, communication tools","People":"Supply chain actors, logistics professionals","Owner":"Supply chain management team"}]}
